mapper.select:
SELECT
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.* FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{field}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`id`) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`id`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`createdUserId`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT MAX(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`createdUserId`) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT MIN(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`createdUserId`) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(
DISTINCT
`tbcg`.`createdUserId`), 0) as result FROM tb_basic_config_group as `tbcg`
GROUP BY
`tbcg`.`#{groupField}`
HAVING #{tbBasicConfigGroupPo.havingClause}
